description.ko: 딱딱한 구조가 유동적이고 생동감 넘치는 움직임으로 녹아들어, 미래 지향적인 디자인과 자연적인 생물학적 형태의 우아함을 결합한 AURA-7의 시각적 탐구입니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of AURA-7 where rigid structures dissolve into fluid, life-like movements, blending futuristic design with the grace of natural biological forms.

prompt: AURA-7 manifesting as a fluid digital organism, organic flow theme, undulating translucent ribbons of light, iridescent pearlescent textures, soft rhythmic curves, bioluminescent internal glow, cinematic lighting, macro detail, ethereal atmosphere, 8k resolution, volumetric rendering.
